definitions.definition: (often in names) a group of people organized for a joint purpose.
a plant community defined by a characteristic group of dominant plant species.
a connection or cooperative link between people or organizations.
examples: he developed a close association with the university
synonyms: affiliation "the association between language and nationalism"

definitions.definition: the action or state of becoming a member of an organization with subordinate status.
examples: Slovenia signed association agreements with the European Union

definitions.definition: the linking of molecules through hydrogen bonding or other interaction short of full bond formation.
a mental connection between ideas or things.
examples: the word bureaucracy has unpleasant associations

definitions.definition: the action of making a mental connection.
examples: the association of alchemy with “hieroglyphics” and “cabala.”

definitions.definition: the fact of occurring with something else; co-occurrence.
examples: cases of cancer found in association with colitis
